title: Silver player just looking for some people to Queue with
body:
Low to high silver players looking to queue together in ranked or norms, any roles are welcome. 
Just looking for some quality company and banter. 
Add me if you are keen

replies.body: I main Support if you ever want to que (I only play between 1am-9am Central Australian time)
Hi I am down leveling up my new account whats your ingame name ill play with you or add iamhaxd

When ever I get on the PC I most like play lol but a lot of the time my brother plays , I am a jungle support main I main Master Yi , Udyr , Leona , ( trying out Aatrox) Amumu , Xin zhao , Elise, and a few more I would like to duo queue but I do have a fear of if I duo , I'll most likely wanna take more risks so it makes me look like a good LEAUGE player . So I don't duo queue that often but I'm willing to give it a try if I have serious friends that wanna grind LP  if your interested add me : ApolloBrahz . BTW I do main support but unfortunately I kinda only play leoan as support but I have much skill in my other charms ,that I could go support with them , I learnt how to udyr support also with aatrox and I'm trying out Yi but I don't build support he is just mainly there for laning  phase
And also I'm currently at this time am rank silver 4 with 100lp still doing my silver 3 promos I have yet to win &I lose any I has just reached 100 lp through my last game
I'm not on that often but if I am I'm always happy to play a game.  Support main, Jungle/ADC secondary.  Username is Tribalmind
